How to Install dirmngr on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • dirmngr

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install dirmngr on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing dirmngr on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall dirmngr in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install dirmngr, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install dirmngr Using apt

To install dirmngr in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install dirmngr using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install dirmngr

The installation of dirmngr might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install dirmngr Using apt-get

To install dirmngr using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install dirmngr.

sudo apt-get -y install dirmngr

Install dirmngr Using Synaptic

To install dirmngr using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install dirmngr on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for dirmngr. This will display the dirmngr package in the package window, now to install dirmngr, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the dirmngr package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of dirmngr.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install dirmngr Using aptitude

To install dirmngr on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of dirmngr.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install dirmngr using the command aptitude install dirmngr.

sudo aptitude -y install dirmngr

How to Upgrade dirmngr on debian

If you want to upgrade the dirmngr package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade dirmngr using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade dirmngr to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade dirmngr.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade dirmngr sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade dirmngr

Upgrade dirmngr using Aptitude

To upgrade dirmngr using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade dirmngr.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade dirmngr

Upgrade dirmngr using Synaptic

To upgrade dirmngr using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for dirmngr, now right-click dirmngr, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade dirmngr just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall dirmngr on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall dirmngr from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just dirmngr, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove dirmngr

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of dirmngr

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of dirmngr you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge dirmngr

Remove dirmngr using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall dirmngr using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for dirmngr, right-click the dirmngr package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall dirmngr click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install dirmngr on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade dirmngr using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of dirmngr then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
